Crypto

Cryptography module for pypasswordmanager.

Imports

base64: for safer encoding of master key during program runs.

Fernet: for encryption and decryption of passwords.

hashes: for access to hashing functions.

PBKDF2HMAC: for generating a master key.

Functions

generate_master_key(): for generating a master key from a master password.

fernet_encrypt(): for encrypting a password.

fernet_decrypt(): for decrypting a password.

crypto.fernet_decrypt(token, master_password, salt)

Uses Fernet object to decrypt a password.

crypto.fernet_encrypt(password, master_password, salt)

Uses Fernet object to encrypt a password

crypto.generate_master_key(master_password, salt)

Generate a master key to be temporarily used by other functions.

Instantiates a PBKDF2HMAC object using secure hash function SHA256 and 48000 iterations of the algorithm, then encodes master password to UTF-8 so it is bytes-like, generates the key, encodes it to url-safe format using base64.urlsafe_b64encode and returns it.

Returns:

safe master key to be used in encryption and decryption.

Return type:

bytes
